conclusion: Analyze the image to understand block interaction based on power, collision, and deflection.
The image shows wooden blocks on a green surface with various colors and arrangements.
Stacked blocks likely have more power due to their height.
Yellow block appears to be in motion, indicating potential collision.
Red blocks positioned away from the central area suggest deflection.
Understand block interaction with environment through power, collision, and deflection effects.
Blocks are in various positions, some stacked, some scattered.
Power effect relates to force exerted by blocks.
Collision effect relates to interaction when blocks contact each other.
Deflection effect relates to change in direction when blocks collide.
